content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in the passenger seat of a car with my father-in-law, wife and daughter. we were headed west bound on hwy 74 in arizona.  

2. they were moving.

3. clouds.

4. there were two perfect looking circles on their sides vertical and the color of clouds; at first i thought that they were clouds. both of them were rotating to a horizontal position. when the two objects got horizontal with the horizon they became very flat and just vanished. i tried telling my father-in-law but before my brain could process what i was seeing they vanished in mid sentence. there was no trail no streak just gone.

5. i felt as if someone had played a magic trick on me or as if i really did not see this just happen, but i witnessed it for too long not for it to had happened.  i was upset with myself for not getting the words out quick enough for anyone else to see, it was just a very strange thing for me to see. i have lived with this strange sighting for about a year now always wandering what or if i really saw those two objects in the sky; deep inside i know that i did. if you have not witnessed  you will never know the feeling of unknowing. i feel that has somewhat changed me and the way i look at things. i now wish that i never saw these things!

6. they vanished or disappeared.
content.summary: Two large perfect circles that had the color of clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Looking north at about 9:30 pm on may 22 and 23 i saw an orange ball appear just above the tree line it hovered then it moved to the right and split into to balls.  they hovered and circled one another then a third orange ball appered in the same spot the first one occured.  within a few seconds the 2 balls came back together to become one and then all there just dissaperead.  the second night i saw one orange ball break off into 2 then go back together and then dissappear. i saw it two more time between 8:30 and 10:00 pm.  when it would appear and dissapear it would resemble a light being turned on but slowly.  i would grow and get brighter over 1-2 sec.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large orange ball appeared then moved horozontally then broke off into another ball then a third one apperead

content.detailedDescription:
Event took place around 7 am at an intersection on columbia pike across from barcroft shopping center.  this area is higher elevation and beyond the shopping center is a panoramic view of skyline office complex.

it was a clear early morning with sun coming up in the east the sky  blue with an yellow/orange glow in the east.  

was sitting in car facing east at traffic light looking directly at the shopping center.  at the intersection, the road makes a curve to the left going to route 7.  

upon coming to traffic light noticed how clear and blue the sky looked, but notice a few thin elongated very dark grey clouds in the sky. the clouds got my attention because they were so grey.

at about 10 o'clock on the windshield of the car, i noticed what initially appeared to me to be a dark spherical cloud.  my eyes glanced at it and then turned away back towards the traffic light, initially thinking it was a cloud, but then the sperical shape caught my attention.  when i looked again, i realized the object was not a cloud, but a craft.  

initially the object seem to have a haze arond it similar to a cloud, but this then disappeared.  i was able to obtain a clear, unobstructive view of the object.

i estimated the object to be approximately 1 to 3 miles away.  it was at least the size of a football stadium.  for the most part the object was stationary.  it was simply parked in the sky.  it was initially flat towards the earth.  then it appeared to sort of slightly dip and then it made a turn so that instead of being flat towards the ground, it turned to look like a big grey dot on it's side.  

after the turn, the object still just hung in the sky.  i had an excellent view of the surface. the surface appeared to be for the most part a smooth and solid. the surface did not appear to be really anything special, it basically looked like the surface of a car.  it was a dark grey color very much like a dark grey color that became popular on some cars such as the pontiac grand prix.  

although the object appeared to be completely solid, in a semi-circular patern around the top edge of the object, i saw these lines form.  suddenly, a semi-circle of beautiful red lights appeared flashing from right to left.  they flased in sequence one after the other. the lights were separate and somewhat rectangular shaped elongated side by side with the narrow sides touching each other.

the encounter was really spectacular and this viewer thoght that a historical event was taking place. however, activity went on as normal.  in the distance, well beyond the shopping center and sky line, air planes could be seen taking off from then national airport. during the encounter nothing unusual took place.  there were no jets in the sky or people getting out of their cars.  thought this was strange.

unfortunately, shortly after the lights started flashing the traffic light change.  back then had to get to work.  however, thought i would be driving in the direction of the object and would get even a better view.  this was not to be.  after the road curved beyond the intersection in decended down to lower elevation, and the object was never seen again.

it should be noted that the object appeared to be in the bailey's cross roads area which is just a stone's throw from the pentagon.

rushed to car after work and turned on the radio to listen to the news for reports on the object.  nothing was reported.  watched all the local tv news broadcasts that evening and heard nothing about the object.  purchased all the local newspapers the next day and found nothing about the object.  

with regards to the question about witnesses, i don't know how to answer.  the object was very big and the assumption was that it would be a major news event.  therefore, the assumption is that many people witnessed it.

the thing that really impressed this viewer is the way the object just hung in the sky. the object clearly owned the sky.  it was methodical and behaved in an unhurried manner without any apparent concern.  

the viewer did develop a sense that the object was suppose to be there and there was a pupose for it being there.  it sort of gave off the feeling to the viewer that one gets while seeing a parked taxi with the engine going waiting to pick up a passenger.
content.summary: Classic saucer shape

content.detailedDescription: For the last two days i have seen an object in the sky that flashes red white green and blue quickly, but always pausing on red for a couple seconds. the first night, which was last night, 5/22/12 at approximately 10:30pm  i was out smoking on my front porch when i noticed a larger than a star object in the sky that was blinking those colors rather quickly. it was only slightly larger but i thought it might be a super nova. it was approximately 300 degrees nw in the sky above the rooftops of nearby houses. it stayed there for about 3 hours then when i came out again it was gone. tonight i had seen the report on channel 5 news and was excited because it was exactly what i had seen the night before. i walked outside and called my father and when i looked up into the sky where i had seen it previously i saw it again, only it was now about 312 degrees nw and it was about the size of a star. as i talked talked to my father i watched it slowly move to the north from 312 degrees to 319 degrees to 324 degrees nw. it was right above the treeline this time instead of above the rooftops and if i moved forward i couldnt see it anymore. this all happened at 10:30pm on 5/23/12. im sure it isnt a star, but im not sure what it is exactly. i thought you guys should know, just in case you wanted to look out and see it.
content.summary: Saw small orb blinking above rooftops multiple colors for a few hours.

content.detailedDescription: I am guestimating the date about feb 11/2010  i lost all the paper documentation in a truck fire.  i have waited a long time but the facts are clear in my mind as though it were yesterday.  i was going to salt lake city utah heading west through colorado with another truck driver.  i was going to salt lake to hire on with kellie simon trucking. the exact date can be gotten from simon trucking as the day i started and this happened the night before. we were heading west on i-70 around the new castle/rifle area.  it was dark out and the sky was clear and i was talking to the driver that had given me a ride into salt lake so i could start my new job.  i was looking at him and a bright green oval shaped object decended rapidly it was trailing a tail of fire that extended from the edges out to about 3 times it's diameter.  it appeared to look like it was black about 20 miles out and an almost neon green glow around the entire edge unbroken.  it looked like the green you might see looking through night vision goggles or from a green calyume lightstick.  the fire trail it was leaving was very close to the same color with slight variances.  it came straight down and appeared to be larger than the mountains that were lit up by its glow.  i was sure it would crash into the mountains but at the last minute it leveled out and went due south behind the mountains. i kept watching for an explosion to indicate that it had crashed. but the mountains obscured my view and there was no bright light to indicate a crash.  i am assuming that it either kept going south or landed out of view.  i was amazed because i had never seen or heard of anything like that in all the accounts i had ever heard.  this is why i am posting here is to find out if anyone else has seen or heard tell of anything like it.  i told the driver of the truck,"did you see that?"  he was almost white from shock and he said," no, and you didn't either!"  so, i assumed that he was extremely uncomfortable with the subject and i said no more of it except to my girlfriend several months later and my family a few weeks after when i got home to load up my gear to put on my truck.  i have only seen two ufo's in my life with my own eyes.  the one i related here and one in the idaho panhandle many years ago.  i am pretty sure we don't have a craft that can dive as fast as this object did and then pull out at the last second and change direction.  if anyone has seen anything like this i would really appreciate knowing.  i had no camera or even a cell phone with a camera the morning this happened.  so i only have the memory of seeing it.  i am pretty sure the other driver would totally deny seeing it if anyone could get him to talk about it. i could draw the craft as i seen it to this day the instant it changed direction will be burned into my memory till the day i die.
content.summary: Rapid decent ufo no observable landing.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and noticed something strange right above me.  i saw two bright lights that were moving in the same direction.   i turned on the video on my phone and found a place to pull over.  once i pulled over i realized there was at least six of them.    all moving in the same direction.  i managed to get all of them on video but them my phone cut out.   someone else  pulled over and witnessed it too but i have no idea who he was.  i had my 8 year old with me, he saw them as well.    was 9:00 at night in milford, pa on 5/19/12.  you can check out the video if you look up you tube "weird lights in the sky, milford pa"
content.summary: I have a video of all six lights, looked like large glowing lights moving across the sky

content.summary: I have a video of all six lights, looked like large glowing lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette. i just happened to glance up at the blue sky and see a commercial jet flying to the s.West. then i saw what i thought was the front of another jet going to collide in the air. i kept blinking my eyes to get a better focus on the objects. thats when i noticed they did not collide and the second object that was flying west was not a plane but a very large silver cigar shape object, no wings, no sound, which is hard to hear in the city anyways.I thought is it a rocket, i was in aw just watching this object fly across the sky heading west fast dont know how fast, but faster than a jet. i watched the object fly into a cloud then out of it and i was in aw could not pull myself away from watching this. it flew across the sky till it was out of my sight of the screened in porch,it flew west in a straight line, heading towards n.Cleveland or there about.
content.summary: Very long silver cigar shaped craft flying approx. west a jet was flying s.Westwatched ufo as it flew across the blue sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for my mother and a neighbor. i personally wasn't at the location at the time of the sighting. 
my mother and 3 other neighbors were sitting outside on her apartment patio at the time and place listed above. my mother and 2 other witneses saw a rectangular object approximately 1 foot long producing a green glow moving at speed over the hedge that is approximately 20 feet from the patio on which she and the other neighbors sat. the object moved at speeds approximating that of a bird in flight. the object traveled from above the hedge to a tree approximately 30 feet away and promptly disappeared (glow turned off?), then reappeared heading away from the patio at the same speed as before. at an approximate distance of 100 feet, the object disappeared again, only to reappear momentarily on the roof of the single story apartment building across the street. at this time, the object changed in luminescent coloration from green to red and pulsated (dimmed and brightened) repeatedly until it disappeared once again and was again seen by my mother and one of her neighbors at treetop level some 250-300 feet distant at which point the object disappeared yet again. finally the object was seen heading back toward their patio only to increase in altitude and make a final disappearance in the clear night sky.

this is about the best i can do for describing this event as i was not present and this is from direct testimony from the 3 witnesses. the 4th person at the event did not see the object the others were seeing as she was not able to follow the rapid appearance and disappearance of the object as the others pointed it out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing green/red 1 foot long flying object

content.detailedDescription:
Saw abnormally large orange globe coming from north kanata heading north/west towards dunrobin. globe changed direction as if circling the city of ottawa in a clock wise direction. i am able to call to my neighbour who witnesses this as well. just as first globe starts to grow dime due to travelling away from my position, a second exact globe travels in the same manner.

i am positioned on a dock out in the ottawa river so i am able to see a large portion of the sky. we both agree that this is abnormal and decide to observe for a longer period of time. within about 40 minutes one more orange globe follows the exact same path. flight is about the same height you would expect a small plane to travel at but no noise, no flashing lights and oddly smooth flight direction. we considered a drone purhaps.

next evening i decide to sit out on the deck again and at aproximately 11 pm the same event happens again, just one globe. googled "ufo ottawa" and read a note about two people seeing orange globes over the city of ottawa and simply wanted to add my two cents. nothing else happened besides the viewing.
content.summary: Orange globe shape, appeared to be circling city of ottawa, two at same time

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in front yard at dusk, saw a light coming from north going directly overhead, told friend who was sitting with me "look, what's that?" it moved to aproximatly 11:00 on the horizon where it stoped and was met with a similar object coming fron the west and another from the east, the object that came from the east and north stoped and waited while the west object moved into position, it made several adjustments to it's position before forming a triangle with the others, then all three moved off to the east very fast, they also changed color several times, they were mostly a whitish glow, but during the "link up" they did change color from orange to blue and back to white again, when the link up was done to what i consider a perfect triangle the glowed much brighter, (very bright), a bluish white
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing object

content.detailedDescription: My name is mark mellein and i am asking for help for any one to come to ojai. and bring some video or some way to see a lot of ufos liveing in the mountains. i dont know how to get help its so real iv seen them so close and far away useing scoops. i am up there by my self and i find themto were i walk up to them.And i dont know what to exspect so i dont get to close to them.Iv went to the police and they told me to seek out mufon to come out and see them     i contact edwerd air forse base but got no answer back iv ritten on the enternet hopfully some one would contact me but no one has. i went up there yesterday to make sure they are up there i found 6 realy butyfull ships.They were black green and gray shinny but the last one i say at the end of the day. was as big as a 3 to 4 story house tryangle shape it had 15 to 20 long shape rocks on the left side and the left side of it was a realy big ovel shap gray green and black ship abought the size of a 2 story house it is on top of a mountain its ben there for a good 3 months its realy hard to find them they are realy good at camo. themselfs i dont know why there are up there or how they servive i have seen them in the river and nere the power lines  it is so amaseing   i do know that they live up there and iv seen there tunnals that open up and close after ships come and go if you dont get back to me on this matter then i will gess that you already know about them but if not then it wwould be realy great to know and film them the reason i an contacting you is i dont have any equptment to film them                            thanks for your time it would be grate if they could be filmed or something
content.summary: There here in the mountains of ojai ca. 93023 in big groops or alone in brush or in the rocks

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the back yard with several family members on a clear night. looking up at the stars noticed a dot moving overhead on a straight path from west to east. we all agreed it to be a satellite until there was a "flare up" that lasted approx 1 - 2 seconds. this lookes similar to a booster rocket firing but was a much shorter duration. after the flare up, the dot accelerate and became more faint until it disappeared completely.
content.summary: Appeared to be a satelite, but flared up as if some sort of booster rocket was ignited.

content.detailedDescription: i sat listening to music in another daughters bedroom.My light was out but light entered from the living room. there is a window four feet from me.This window did not go outside.It did not connect to the outside. behind the window was an enclosed patio.The entity sat on some kind of chair.Around him was lighter than his dark grey monks robe with hood. he kept his head lowered and i couldn't see its face.For about 15minutes i stood still while i observed. it never moved and suddenly it the figure began to turn into grayish white smoke. it bnunpne.Egan to be sucked up into about a one inch spot in midagoir andisapeared comnonepletely.
content.summary: On this contact i was sitting in my daughters bedroom.Listening to music with earphoneses. i sat three feet from 4by4 window looked at window and observed an entity wearing a robe with hood sitting on maybe chair.I didn't move and it stayed still.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a daughter home in the city of diamond bar reading and listening to music with earphones in the upstairs bedroom. i felt a strong urge to look out the window and observed a silver metalic probe hovering below and across the street between the two front houses. i watched and studied it for about ten minutes. a car approached and it went behind a large bush. i didn't go outside or told anyone till months later. again i felt thtpiianonet i should not mention it.
content.summary: Looked out second floor window and observed a silver metalic probe across the street hovering 5' off the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo in san antonio, texas on may 22, 2012 at 11:59 p.M. between wurzbach and huebner and vance jackson and ih10.  at first i thought my neighbors had gotten a motion detector light but it didn't make sense to me why a light was actually shining right on me (like a spotlight).  i looked up and saw what i thought to be at first a helicopter search light...But then i noticed there was no noise.   the object was round and about half the size of a full moon with a slight orange outline. it was moving very quickly across the sky (not as fast as a commercial airplane and much faster than a helicopter.  the white light and object were extraordinary...Like what you see when iron is so hot it turns brilliant white.  it seemed like it was only about 200-300 feet above me.  i ran out into the yard to get a better look and it was no longer in the path it had been traveling (west to north) and had disappeared.
content.summary: Shined spotlight on me.  molten white object & light. orange outline.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:15 pm and me and a friend had set up a telescope to see the night sky away from the city lights. we parked in the driveway of an abandoned worn-down trailer and set up. after a few hours of viewing, we were talking about taking down the telescope and as my friend began to take apart the scope, i looked up in the sky towards the southwest in the general direction of gila bend. i saw a very orange light and then it went off and one came on in front of its location, as if heading in our direction. then, that light went out and another came on in front of it, closer to us. in all, 6 lights did this coming toward our direction and what to me appeared to be directly over the train track across the street. my first thought was that it went on light a lightning bug light does. it seemed like a natural light to me in that way when it went on and off. it was completely silent outside--nothing around--very quiet. by about the third light, i knew this wasn't normal and called my friend. he looked up and saw the light a few times before it went away for a while. i rushed for my flipcam and my friend rushed to put away the telescope, not comfortable with the weird lights. a few minutes later, we looked up again and saw them, in a slightly different location, slightly more southerly. it seemed like two lights that would go on and off separately and sometimes on together and seeming to move slightly, slowly in the same direction together. they were redder than a hps light, but still in the orange part of the spectrum. they were about 5 degrees off the horizon, about a degree apart, and about -2 magnitude (my astronomy/chemistry friend reports these definitions). these events would last only seconds, the lights being on anywhere from 2 seconds to 5 seconds and about a few minutes between showings again. the lights were interpreted by my friend as having a slight twinkling, but not as much as stars at that altitude. to me, they had that lightning bug quality of how they went on and off and how long they lit. my friend reports the lights going on and off as ramping on for a half second on and then a half second off. my friend got his binoculars and caught one light in the sights and it looked rather incandescent and not like a line source. he could see stars around the light, it was not blocking out part of the sky. there were no planes associated with the lights, though we had seen a few planes in that area, but not at that time. all together we witnessed these light events about 5 times. we finally had more than a few minutes apart from the last witnessing and the scope was packed and we were ready to leave, so we left. i did pull out the flipcam and got some choppy video of one of the lights. i am curious by nature and i was excited to see it, felt it was a strange wonder of nature. i had no sense of it being attached to a vehicle because of the random spacing of the lights. my friend thought it was very unusual and had never seen anything like it. he knew it was not any kind of star or planet. and, not any typical behavior of an aircraft. he thought it was approaching us at first and spooked him a little bit.
content.summary: Random orange lights turning on and off/moving in sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 355am when i walked outside on my deck with my dog to let him use the bathroom as i always do around this time. while he does his business i take the time to skywatch. i looked up into the sky in a northeastern direction and witnessed what i can only describe as a large comet(within the atmosphere) traveling slowly in a north-east direction. this lasted about 8-12 seconds. it was extremely bright. white-ish yellow in color. leaving an enormous tail which lit up the sky for many seconds after the glowing "comet" had disappeared behind the hills. i was awestruck. i would love to know what i saw. ive seen nothing comparable other than a comet in my 35 years.
content.summary: A large "comet-like-object" within our atmosphere is the only way to describe it.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 355am when i walked outside on my deck with my dog to let him use the bathroom as i always do around this time. while he does his business i take the time to skywatch. i looked up into the sky in a northeastern direction and witnessed what i can only describe as a large comet(within the atmosphere) traveling slowly in a north-east direction. this lasted about 8-12 seconds. it was extremely bright. white-ish yellow in color. leaving an enormous tail which lit up the sky for many seconds after the glowing "comet" had disappeared behind the hills. i was awestruck. i would love to know what i saw. ive seen nothing comparable other than a comet in my 35 years.
content.summary: A large "comet-like-object" within our atmosphere is the only way to describe it.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside because i could not sleep, so i was looking at the stars to pass the time. i saw a peach-colored light far off and it was brighter than the stars so i thought it was mars or something. i continued looking around and about a minute and a half to two minutes later, i looked at it again. it had gotten closer. in disbelief i stared until it was close enough to see 3 peach-ish lights, and a red light slowly blinking (in the rear of the object). it got about 25 feet from the ground and slowly drifted over me, continuing diagonally to my right. i was frozen in place, goosebumps immediatly popped up on my arms in my shock/awe. there was no sound at all, and considering the distance above me, i expected something. as it went over my house i moved further out into my back yard, watching as it went over my house and continued diagonally to my right until i couldnt see it anymore. it was oval-shaped. almost like a mantaray without a tail. all i could think was, "no freaking way...I am not actually one of they few to witness this?! there is no way.." and then it was gone. (it never took off, just a slow drifting/hovering). i went out front about 20 minutes later hoping to see it coming back, i guess, but alas it was long gone. i couldn't even run inside to grab my ipod touch to take a picture or video. i was too afraid to miss anything, and honestly i was glued in place.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Came from far off, slowly drifted over me and passed over my house/

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were talking in our mothers driveway right by her car at the end of the driveway when we both noticed a light shoot up some 5 to ten miles away to the south east.Then the light dropped some and then seemed to hover,this caught our attention and really intrigued me and it also strikes me as odd.It was about 1:00 am and we just started to talk some more.The light just seemed like it was staying in one place so we weren't concerned till about 20 minutes went by and we noticed the light was getting closer moving really slow and really low. the light was faint but we could see it the whole time and we waited till we could see the craft or whatever with the naked eye,when we could see it ( an hr later)it was as over the freeway down the street,it was then we saw a dark craft approaching the size of a skyscraper(a close estimation)completely silent the craft was and so were we,we couldn't believe our eyes this thing was heading directly over us and it did.I/ we saw close detail.This thing was shaped sort of like a giant space shuttle from the front,bottom and back,but imagine the space shuttle with a lot smaller wings(my brother calls it the missile as a joke)kinda tucked in.You could even see the thing looked plated or tiled like the space shuttle,the thing was mostly a unique green color with some red outline (or accents) there were no windows that we could see and i looked good,there was only one light under the craft which was located on a protrusion on the ship that resembled the passenger area from a blimp but there were no windows( the light blinked like a slow strobe.This craft made no noise ans even blocked out all noise and the sky when it was overhead,only when we we directly under the center of this long craft that it made a faint rumble or thrust noise,the noise came and went quick,this thing was as long or longer than my mothers street( not kidding)it was moving a a fast walking speed and and took a couple minutes to completely pass over,when it did we could see a very large propulsion  or thrust area that took up the whole back of the ship,it resembled a large rocket thrust that was quite dimmer and completely silent. most importantly is the fact that this thing should have just fell down,there is nothing that could hold something like that in the air at that speed, on a strange note the red and green colors resembled russian or soviet colors and it did look like a giant man made missile/shuttle. then the thing just continued on at slow pace like it was headed toward canada. we hadn't a camera or we would either be famous or assaniated,we did call the local police station to make a report assuming others must have seen it and also called but we were only young teens and they didn't take us serious,or treat us nice,any way i've been looking for another like sighting ever since,i believe in ancient aliens and modern day aliens,
content.summary: Man made like craft witnessed by 2,as large as a skyscraper,moving at walking speed

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, my name is vu, i am a vietnamese and i am a cab driver. on friday 5/11/2012. after dropped a lady at elementary school, se powell valley road, gresham.  i driver my cab to find somewhere to get a good shot of mount hood because that day the sky was very clear! ( my hoppy is to take photos).  i shot some pictures of mount hood but i wasnt happy because they were not good enough! then i accepted one order from highway 212, north clackamas. i used gps and i had to drive 20 miles to get customer. when i was driving on waybill road, gresham. i saw the mount hood with very beautiful view. i stopped my cab and took 02 pictures. i was so happy because i had very good shots. and then i come to pick up and drop off customer at estacada. when i come home at night, after download memory card to my laptop. open the pictures,i saw one ufo next to mount hood.  i was very excited because i had one ufo picture. (last year, i saw something with diamond shaped above the trees when i drove my cab on ross island bridge about 7a.M.  it moved slowly and disappeared). 
the next day. i called my closed friend named chio chao, who is a cab driver and he believed on ufos, because he saw one brown round on gresham areas. when i showed him the picture of ufos. he said wow! you got one.  latter when i zoom in the picture, i saw 04 other ufos around the big one. then i looked around my picture i saw something like a man above the tree! was that an alien?
this is my story about ufos pictures.
may gods keep eyes on you and your family in peaceful!

p/s: these pictures were took with nikon d 90/ lens 18-105mm. 
 1/the first picture there were one blur big and 2 little dot of ufos. but the alien was above the tree.
2/the second pictures there were 5 of ufos with the alien.
and included my 04 another zoom pictures.
content.summary: Alien,ufos & mount hood , oregon

content.detailedDescription: It could have been a plane, but it was flying way too low to make such a rumbling noise. plane fly around here all the time, but not that low to make that kind of sound. i was in my room, upstairs and it sounded like it was flying over the house. i went to the window and looked out, all i could see was this little white light in the distance. it blinked in a line, what looked to be three lights going across, all three white. it was really far in the distance by the time i got the picture, but the sound carried on for about 6 minutes.
content.summary: Very loud rumbling noise, white light.

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture and was looking them over when i noticed this dot in the clouds. it seems to be traveling into the atmosphere. this is the 2nd odd dot in the sky over waynesboro, pa near blue summit, that i have noticed in my photos.  the first one was stationary as if hovering however this one seems to be moving into the atmosphere.  the time and day are the timestamp of my phone camera.
content.summary: I took this picture and was looking them over when i noticed this dot in the clouds. it seems to be traveling into the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: I just got out of gb3 and saw a bright orb like thing size of a m&m next to a star so i know it wasn't a state and with in seconds it faded away in to the night sky
content.summary: Bright orb

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8.30pm, my husband and i went out on to the porch for a cigarette. our porch faces an easterly direction over looking the george airbase.  my husband pointed out 2 flashing red lights directly overhead.  at first i assumed it to be a plane, however, they were a fair distance apart, much further than that of any plane i've ever seen.  secondly i've never seen a plane with 2 port lights, usually there is a green light on the starboard side.  thirdly, there was absolutely no sound.  

we continued to observe these 2 lights as they moved slowly in an easterly direction over the george airbase.  the object or lights, then seemed to hover over the northern end of the airbase for a short period of time.  the lights were flashing separately, then in time, then differently again.  the object or lights then proceeded in an easterly direction toward the mountain ranges.  it was then we observed more red lights flashing independently and a fair distance apart, but all traveling in the same direction and all changed direction in unison, which lead us to believe it was many lights on the one object, or a group of lights flying in no particular formation, but together.

at one point we observed 4 maybe 5 lights at one time.  the object or lights went over the mountain ranges and disappeared.  we did attempt to get some video footage, which we will upload if anything is visible.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red lights flashing sequentially at first then separately.

content.detailedDescription: Throughout my life my father had been very interested in u.F.O.S,therefore i was a huge believer myself growing up listening to investigations,stories and findings.As a small child around 8years old i firmly believe i saw a ufo from the rear window of my dads vehicle while we were vacationing and stopped at a gas station in brooklyn,ny.I was young and could have been mistaken but moving forward 14 years later i was a u.S. marine stationed at a california base in oceanside,ca.Now 22 yrs old i found a young woman that i fell in love with who lived 10 minutes away in vista,ca.As we were on one of our first dates i took her out for some ice cream at a local shop in vista off of sante fe drive.Soon enough we finished eating our cones and sat at the bench table holding hands across from one anothe.This was about 8:30 p.M.As we were talking love with each other i happened to look up at the stars above me.It was a crystal clear night and i enjoy looking at the stars during these times.Soon as i glanced upward to the sky i happened to see a disk like object stationary right above me but far away into the sky.It pulsated different color lights,green,red,white etc. and these lights were moving in a circular motion.At this time i was really excited and shocked in seeing this i told my new girlfriend and soon to be wife if she sees what i am seeing right now.Of course she was into me to much so she wasnt really involved with it.Being around the military base i knew a chance it could have been a helicopter or plane except for one thing.Helicopters and planes dont just stop in midair going slowly side to side then shoot up into space.I was a military man and i surely know the difference between planes,helicopters and what i saw..A ufo.From expierience.This object was stationary,then moved slowly like 5miles pr hour to the left,then to the right and went stationary again all the while pulsating different lights.Then it zoomed upwards and disappeared.My girlfriend who is now my wife was there with me and she saw it as well since i made a big fuss about it.From there on i always glance at the stars hoping to see another.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rounded disk shaped object hovering above me high in the sky on a clear night,with flashing colorful lights circling from the object.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4:15 am on may 21st 2012 to go get a glass of water, when i finished drinking my water i took a peek outside from the kitchen window. at first i tought somebody was in the field behind my house (wooded area)with a flashlight (about 100 feet at first) but i noticed that the light was blinking, i was a bit worried about the possibility of a burglar. i kept watching, after about 10 seconds the light was coming in my direction in a straight line. as it got closer i realized that it was about 15 feet from the ground, it got out of the woods and stopped in my backyard about 25 to 30 feet from the house, it hovered for about 5 seconds, it started to go to the left, it stopped hovered 2 to 3 seconds, after went to the right, up and down, it stopped again at about 5 feet from the ground and hovered again for about 5 seconds, i decided to go outside, i slowly opened the patio door and went on the deck so i could have a good look at it. i stood in front of it for about 10 seconds, it raised about 15 to 20 feet from the ground and left slowly and lost sight of it behind my neighbours houses. i really don't know wat it was, i'm not saying that it is a ufo, i am skeptic about these things, is it an explainable phenomenon ? maybe it is. that is why i am reporting it. maybe somebody could give me an answer. the description of the object (if it is an object) was about the size of a golfball, it emitted an extremely bright white light, it was blinking aproximately every 2 seconds and it was completely silent. i was totally shocked and could not go back to sleep after the sighting, i am still troubled as i am writing down this report.

thank you ...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blinking ball of light.
